title: Purchased Stage Data Schema (IMPACTO Model v0.1)
description: JSON schema defining the structure of the 'purchased' stage data for a cybersecurity investment. Captures capabilities of the purchased solution, the risk posture before and expected after implementation, operating context, and initial AI recommendations.

model_version.description: Version of the IMPACTO model schema ("0.1" for this version).

service_name.description: Name of the security service or product that has been purchased.

organization.description: Organization or department implementing this service.

purchase_date.description: Date (or date-time) when the service/product was purchased. (Format: YYYY-MM-DD)

capabilities.description: Key capabilities/features of the purchased solution and their planned usage status.

name.description: Name of the capability or feature (e.g., "Dynamic Posture Management").

description.description: What the capability does or enables.

status.description: Deployment status of this capability in the organization (e.g., enabled, planned).

initial_risk_score.description: Risk score or level **before** this solution is implemented (higher = more risk). For example, 8 on a 1-10 scale.

expected_risk_score.description: Expected risk score **after** the solution is fully implemented (residual risk). For example, 4 on a 1-10 scale.

operating_context.description: Contextual factors about the environment where this solution operates (to inform planning).

environment.description: Environment/architecture (e.g., "Hybrid cloud with on-prem data centers").

user_count.description: Number of users/accounts that will be protected or affected by this solution.

user_types.description: Types of users (e.g., employees, contractors, third-parties) if relevant.

compliance_requirements.description: Relevant compliance or regulatory standards that affect configuration (e.g., HIPAA, CJIS).

maturity.description: Current and target cybersecurity maturity levels at this stage.

current_level.description: Current maturity level at time of purchase (e.g., 1-5 scale).

target_level.description: Target maturity level to reach after implementing this solution and associated roadmap.

model.description: Optional maturity model name or description (e.g., "Internal scale 1-5").

AI_recommendations.description: Initial AI-assisted recommendations generated at purchase time. These guide the creation of the roadmap.

area.description: Area of recommendation (e.g., training, feature, integration).

recommendation.description: The recommended action or next step (e.g., "Provide specialized admin training on new tool").

trigger.description: The reason or context for this recommendation (e.g., "New tool unfamiliar to staff").

priority.description: Priority level for this recommendation (e.g., High, Medium, Low).
